## Chapter 2

`c` is for concatenate, forming a vector `x`

```{r}
x <- c(1,3,2,5)
x
```

The '+' function will add arrays by index (they must have the same length)

```{r}
x <- c(1,6,2)
y <- c(1,4,3)
x + y

```
